channel.title: Make host machine more invisible to the network (or more undistinguishably)
channel.description:
Now whonix runs inside a VM. But not the VM is connected to a network, the host computer is. When the host connects, the network can see all the host machines ports/name/mac adresses etc.
How can I make myself even more invisible to the network? Or not invisible - more undistinguishably from other machines Mac Adress changing is one way, as in the wiki. (Pre Install Advice)
Do you have any more tips?

item.title: Make host machine more invisible to the network (or more undistinguishably)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Hide_Tor_and_Whonix_from_your_ISP is related, but perhaps not what you want.

No, I donâ€™t think there are any documented and/or legal ways to do so.
